subject: Business invoice
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to purchase a few things to my VR Arcade simracing section. I
am gonna need an invoice issued on my business name so I could include the
purchase in my company expenses. Should I place an order using shopping
cart on your site or do you have different way for business clients ?

Also I could be interested in selling your gear here in Poland. Would be
happy to have a look on your wholesale offer.

Kind regards
Piotr Grajek

conversations.body_text: Hi Piotr Grajek,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
